name: Santelmo
description:
Move your pawns or your king by selecting a unit, then selecting 1 of the two cards provided to you.

The cards dictate where your units can move.

Win either by capturing the opponent's King, or by moving your King into the opponent's throne.

According to Philippine Mythology, the Santelmo (derived from St. Elmo's Fire) are two balls of light that are usually seen fighting each other.

This is a clone of the game, Onitama, with Philippine Mythological creatures replacing the animals. The game is meant to be played by two people, one on the Blue side and one on the Red side.

This game is a product of me practicing my skills and is not meant to be sold or used for profit.
